docs.title: Project Setup
docs.text:
• make sure all software requirements are met beforehand
  • create new pip environment
pipenv shell
  • installing python packages is handled via pipenv
pipenv install [package name...]

docs.title: Software
docs.text:
• Visual Studio Code
  • git
  • python 3.11 64 bit
  • pip
    • py -m ensurepip --upgrade
    • pip install pipenv

docs.title: (optional) Visual Studio Code Extensions
docs.text:
• Markdown Preview Enhanced
  • Github Copilot
  • Python (v2023.18.0, because the newer version has some weird bugs..)
  • better Comments
  • autoDocstring
  • Rainbow CSV
